mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_ID, COMP_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, CATEGORY_MAIN, CATEGORY_SUB, VENDOR_NAME, PRODUCT_SPEC, UNIT, PACK_QTY, SAFETY_STOCK, PURCHASE_PRICE, SELL_PRICE, REG_USER, REG_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS, PRODUCT_IMAGE, NOTE FROM PRODUCTS ORDER BY PRODUCT_ID ASC
SELECT PRODUCT_ID FROM PRODUCTS WHERE PRODUCT_ID LIKE #{prefix} || '%' ORDER BY PRODUCT_ID DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT PRODUCT_ID, COMP_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, CATEGORY_MAIN, CATEGORY_SUB, VENDOR_NAME, PRODUCT_SPEC, UNIT, PACK_QTY, SAFETY_STOCK, PURCHASE_PRICE, SELL_PRICE, REG_USER, REG_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS, PRODUCT_IMAGE, NOTE FROM PRODUCTS WHERE 1=1
AND PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{productName} || '%'
AND CATEGORY_MAIN LIKE '%' || #{categoryMain} || '%'
AND CATEGORY_SUB LIKE '%' || #{categorySub} || '%'
AND VENDOR_NAME LIKE '%' || #{vendorName} || '%'
AND COMP_ID LIKE '%' || #{compId} || '%'
AND PACK_QTY = #{packQty}
AND STATUS = #{status}
ORDER BY PRODUCT_ID ASC

SELECT PRODUCT_ID, COMP_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, CATEGORY_MAIN, CATEGORY_SUB, VENDOR_NAME, PRODUCT_SPEC, UNIT, PACK_QTY, SAFETY_STOCK, PURCHASE_PRICE, SELL_PRICE, REG_USER, REG_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS, PRODUCT_IMAGE, NOTE FROM PRODUCTS WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}

SELECT PRODUCT_ID, COMP_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, CATEGORY_MAIN, CATEGORY_SUB, VENDOR_NAME, PRODUCT_SPEC, UNIT, PACK_QTY, SAFETY_STOCK, PURCHASE_PRICE, SELL_PRICE, REG_USER, REG_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS, PRODUCT_IMAGE, NOTE FROM PRODUCTS WHERE 1=1
AND PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{productName} || '%'
AND CATEGORY_MAIN LIKE '%' || #{categoryMain} || '%'
AND CATEGORY_SUB LIKE '%' || #{categorySub} || '%'
AND VENDOR_NAME LIKE '%' || #{vendorName} || '%'
AND COMP_ID LIKE '%' || #{compId} || '%'
AND PACK_QTY >= #{packQtyFrom}
AND PACK_QTY <= #{packQtyTo}
AND REG_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{regDateFrom}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND REG_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{regDateTo}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + INTERVAL '1' DAY - INTERVAL '1' SECOND
AND STATUS = #{status}
ORDER BY PRODUCT_ID ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCTS ( PRODUCT_ID, COMP_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, CATEGORY_MAIN, CATEGORY_SUB, VENDOR_NAME, PRODUCT_SPEC, UNIT, PACK_QTY, SAFETY_STOCK, PURCHASE_PRICE, SELL_PRICE, REG_USER, REG_DATE, STATUS, PRODUCT_IMAGE, NOTE ) VALUES ( #{productId}, #{compId}, #{productName}, #{categoryMain}, #{categorySub}, #{vendorName}, #{productSpec}, #{unit}, #{packQty}, #{safetyStock}, #{purchasePrice}, #{sellPrice}, #{regUser}, #{regDate}, NVL(#{status}, '040002'), #{productImage}, #{note} )
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCTS SET COMP_ID = NVL(#{compId}, COMP_ID), PRODUCT_NAME = NVL(#{productName}, PRODUCT_NAME), CATEGORY_MAIN = NVL(#{categoryMain}, CATEGORY_MAIN), CATEGORY_SUB = NVL(#{categorySub}, CATEGORY_SUB), VENDOR_NAME = NVL(#{vendorName}, VENDOR_NAME), PRODUCT_SPEC = NVL(#{productSpec}, PRODUCT_SPEC), UNIT = NVL(#{unit}, UNIT), PACK_QTY = NVL(#{packQty}, PACK_QTY), SAFETY_STOCK = NVL(#{safetyStock}, SAFETY_STOCK), PURCHASE_PRICE = NVL(#{purchasePrice}, PURCHASE_PRICE), SELL_PRICE = NVL(#{sellPrice}, SELL_PRICE), UPDATE_USER = NVL(#{updateUser}, UPDATE_USER), UPDATE_DATE = NVL(#{updateDate}, SYSDATE), STATUS = NVL(#{status}, STATUS), PRODUCT_IMAGE = NVL(#{productImage}, PRODUCT_IMAGE), NOTE = NVL(#{note}, NOTE) WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
UPDATE PRODUCTS SET STATUS = #{status}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser}, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
UPDATE PRODUCTS SET STATUS = #{status}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser}, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} AND STATUS = '040002'
mapper.select: SELECT STATUS, COUNT(*) as COUNT FROM PRODUCTS GROUP BY STATUS ORDER BY STATUS
SELECT PRODUCT_ID, STATUS, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE, REG_USER, REG_DATE FROM PRODUCTS WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}

SELECT PRODUCT_ID, COMP_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, CATEGORY_MAIN, CATEGORY_SUB, VENDOR_NAME, PRODUCT_SPEC, UNIT, PACK_QTY, SAFETY_STOCK, PURCHASE_PRICE, SELL_PRICE, REG_USER, REG_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS, PRODUCT_IMAGE, NOTE FROM PRODUCTS WHERE STATUS = '040002' ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC

SELECT PRODUCT_ID, COMP_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, CATEGORY_MAIN, CATEGORY_SUB, VENDOR_NAME, PRODUCT_SPEC, UNIT, PACK_QTY, SAFETY_STOCK, PURCHASE_PRICE, SELL_PRICE, REG_USER, REG_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS, PRODUCT_IMAGE, NOTE FROM PRODUCTS WHERE STATUS = '040001' ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC

SELECT PRODUCT_ID, COMP_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, CATEGORY_MAIN, CATEGORY_SUB, VENDOR_NAME, PRODUCT_SPEC, UNIT, PACK_QTY, SAFETY_STOCK, PURCHASE_PRICE, SELL_PRICE, REG_USER, REG_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS, PRODUCT_IMAGE, NOTE FROM PRODUCTS WHERE STATUS = '040003' ORDER BY UPDATE_DATE DESC
SELECT DISTINCT PRODUCT_NAME FROM PRODUCTS WHERE PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND STATUS = '040001' ORDER BY PRODUCT_NAME FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY
SELECT DISTINCT VENDOR_NAME FROM PRODUCTS WHERE VENDOR_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND STATUS = '040001' ORDER BY VENDOR_NAME FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY

SELECT CATEGORY_MAIN, COUNT(*) as TOTAL_COUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN STATUS = '040001' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as APPROVED_COUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN STATUS = '040002' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as PENDING_COUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN STATUS = '040003' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as REJECTED_COUNT FROM PRODUCTS GROUP BY CATEGORY_MAIN ORDER BY CATEGORY_MAIN

SELECT PRODUCT_ID, COMP_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, CATEGORY_MAIN, CATEGORY_SUB, VENDOR_NAME, PRODUCT_SPEC, UNIT, PACK_QTY, SAFETY_STOCK, PURCHASE_PRICE, SELL_PRICE, REG_USER, REG_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS, PRODUCT_IMAGE, NOTE FROM PRODUCTS ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC FETCH FIRST #{limit} ROWS ONLY
SELECT SUBSTR(PRODUCT_ID, 1, 4) as PREFIX, COUNT(*) as COUNT FROM PRODUCTS WHERE PRODUCT_ID LIKE 'PRD%' GROUP BY SUBSTR(PRODUCT_ID, 1, 4) ORDER BY PREFIX
